## What Is Licorice Toothpaste?
A gentle, fluoride-free toothpaste formulated with licorice (mulethi) and neem to support gum health, soothe irritation, and provide antimicrobial action.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Licorice soothes mucous membranes and reduces acidity; neem offers natural antimicrobial properties to maintain oral balance.

### Key Benefits
- Soothes gums and reduces irritation.
- Natural antimicrobial support.
- Free from synthetic foaming agents and fluoride (optional formulation).

## Ingredients
- Neem powder or extract
- Licorice extract
- Calcium carbonate (mild polishing agent)
- Clove essential oil

## Usage Instructions
- Brush twice daily as usual. Rinse thoroughly.

## Packaging
- Recyclable tube or refill pouch to reduce waste.

## Safety & Consultation
- If you have severe gum disease, consult a dentist before switching.

## Why Choose This Toothpaste?
A natural, effective herbal alternative for daily oral care that focuses on soothing and long-term gum health.
